articles.description: Red Bull’s Max Verstappen takes pole for the sprint race at the United States Grand Prix, with title rival Lando Norris fourth.
articles.title: US Grand Prix: Max Verstappen takes sprint pole with Lando Norris fourth

articles.description: The Women's T20 World Cup is guaranteed a first-time winner as New Zealand beat West Indies to join South Africa in Sunday's final.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup results: New Zealand reach final with eight-run win over West Indies

articles.description: England should be flattered by Pakistan's pitch plan, but the second Test wasn't only decided at the toss, says Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England: Multan pitch plan a compliment to tourists

articles.description: Ronnie Gibbons alleges he tried to "forcefully" kiss her at Harrods on two occasions when she was 20.
articles.title: Ex-Fulham Ladies captain Ronnie Gibbons ‘groped’ by Al Fayed

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag accuses the media of making up "fairytales and lies" about his future.
articles.title: Erik ten Hag: Manchester United manager accuses media of making up 'fairytales and lies' about his future

articles.description: India recover from being dismissed for just 46 in their first innings to reach 231-3 at close on day three of the first Test against New Zealand, trailing the Black Caps by 125 runs.
articles.title: India v New Zealand: Hosts fight back on day three in Bengaluru

articles.description: New Zealand win both races on Friday to open up a 6-2 lead over Great Britain and move within a point of retaining the America's Cup.
articles.title: America's Cup: New Zealand extend lead over GB to close in on glory

articles.description: Newcastle United manager Eddie Howe says he was not contacted by the Football Association in their recent hunt for a new England manager.
articles.title: Eddie Howe: Newcastle manager was not interviewed for England job

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats as Leeds United take on Sheffield United in the Championship.
articles.title: EFL Championship LIVE: Leeds United vs Sheffield United - score & text updates

articles.description: A late try from Wales wing Tom Rogers secured Scarlets a notable win against 14-man Bulls in a tense United Rugby Championship game in Llanelli.
articles.title: Scarlets 23-22 Bulls: Hosts celebrate win against 14-man visitors
